articles.author: Maeve Campbell
articles.title: 10% of cancer cases in Europe caused by pollution, says groundbreaking new study - Euronews
articles.description: Groundbreaking study by the EEA names the pollutants and chemicals causing 10% of European cancer cases.
articles.content:
10 per cent of cancer cases in Europe are caused by air pollution, according to a new study published today.
The European Environment Agency (EEA) recently reviewed the latest scientific evidence on… [+7127 chars]

articles.title: Price cap on Russian oil could shake up the market - CNN
articles.description: Europe and the United States have barred the import of Russian oil to cut off a crucial revenue source for the Kremlin. But the plan to pile pain on President Vladimir Putin, forcing him to reconsider his war in Ukraine, hasn't worked.
